title: The Pussycat that ran away
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Moral development in children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Brothers and sisters
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Moral development in children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Psychological aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Moral development in children
description: Two boys spend the summer on a dairy farm in Norway. When one of them is unkind to the other his cat is so disappointed in him that he runs away. During the search that follows Eric learns a great deal including the importance of obeying his parents and of being kind to his brother.
